A Note from Nurse Whiskers, Founder & Chief Napping Officer

I worked the night shift at St. Bartholomew's Feline ICU for nine years. Nine years of fluorescent lights and the quiet beeping of machines monitoring cats who'd eaten things they shouldn't have.

Somewhere around year six, I stopped being able to tell when I was asleep. The dreams felt clinical. The shifts felt imaginary. I once filed a real incident report about a patient who turned into a salmon. HR was understanding. They were not understanding.

Then one night ‚Äî or maybe a dream ‚Äî I fell from a very tall shelf. In the dream, I shattered my pelvis. I woke up and called my insurance. They said they don't cover dreams. I said: what do you mean you don't cover dreams, I was there, I felt it, I have emotional damages. They hung up.

I haven't slept in 11 days. The balloon is real. I can see it from here. It's always been real. ‚Äî N.W.

Our Floating Claims Office

All policy meetings take place at 14,000 feet. We believe altitude improves honesty. Also, it is harder to leave a meeting when you are in a basket above the clouds. Cancellation requests must be submitted mid-flight, in writing, by paw.

Fur-equently Asked Questions
Is this real insurance?
We are as real as anything you experience with your eyes closed. Our actuarial tables are maintained by a team of 14 sleeping cats in a server room in Portland. They have never been awake at the same time.
How do I file a claim?
Board the balloon. Bring the dream in a jar. If you cannot jar the dream, describe it to our claims adjuster (a tabby named Leonard who will not make eye contact with you). Leonard has a 93% claim approval rate. We do not know what he does with the other 7%.
Can I insure someone else's dream?
No. Legally and metaphysically, you may only insure dreams you have personally inhabited. We tried third-party dream insurance in 2019. We lost Leonard's brother. We do not discuss this.
Nurse Whiskers, are you okay?
I appreciate your concern. I am in the balloon. I have always been in the balloon. The balloon is in the dream. The dream is in the balloon. I would like to come down now but the wind is very beautiful up here and also I don't remember how.

PurrDream Mutual is not licensed to operate in any waking jurisdiction. All policies are binding only during REM cycles exceeding 11 minutes. Coverage void if you are a dog. Coverage void if you dream about being a dog. Coverage void in the state of Arizona for reasons we are not at liberty to discuss. Premium payments are collected via direct deposit from your dream bank account (routing number provided during onboarding nightmare).
